Text: nice one, listened to both parts as they were broadcast, probably the best intv Joni has ever done, glad you put this up 4 share, its a must xx

Thanks! Recorded Part 1 for myself but couldn't get part 2 due to working late.

Hope you don't mind me saying, though, it sounds a bit tinny for 160bps. Is it a "Listen Again" capture?

Yeah it's a stream rip from "listen again".
I coverted from real audio to mp3 for convenience and used 160k to avoid too much further degradation.
